chargeHist.descr: Possess Firearm-Adjudicated Deliquent of a Felony

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Possess Firearm-Adjudicated Deliquent of a Felony

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gregory L Boose

records.addlTxt: Status conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Gregory L Boose not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael F Torphy in court for Gregory L Boose.  Attorney Paul Leonard Tiffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court reporter appears via Zoom video.
Defense counsel advises Court that defendant has reviewed discovery and met with the defendant.  Defense counsel has received authorization of medical records but has not yet received the medical records and requests adjournment.
Court orders case adjourned for status in Branch 28.

Court did not rule as to whether defendant has to repay the County for appointment of counsel.

Court approves defense counsel appearing via video conference on the next court date.

Clerk:  jms
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Gregory L Boose in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael F Torphy in court for Gregory L Boose.  Attorney Paul Leonard Tiffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound Defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Sanders, Branch 28.   Original Information received and filed.  Copy given to Defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant was arraigned in open court and pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 28. 

Clerk:  jms
Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense.  Signed and Filed.  nk

Defendant Gregory L Boose appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michael F Torphy in court for Gregory L Boose.  Defendant's in person appearance waived.  Attorney Paul Leonard Tiffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for doctor's report return.  Doctor's Report received and filed.  Parties do not dispute the findings and Court reinstates the proceedings.  Court appointed counsel for defense, Attorney Michael F. Torphy accepted appointment on July 15, 2022; defendant is not required to reimburse Milwaukee County for attorney fee.  Defense to consider waiving preliminary hearing and requested scheduling conference date.  Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 28; defendant to be produced for the next court date.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Letter to the Court from defense counsel dated August 24, 2022 - received
from Deborah L. Collins, Psy.D., ABPP dated August 24, 2022

Attorney Michael F Torphy in court, defendant Gregory L Boose not in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense

-  signed by the Court (electronically)

During the hearing of July 13, 2022 Attorney Michael Torphy was present in court.  Court held off the record discussion with Attorney Torphy about appointment to this case and advised that should he appoint Attorney Torphy to the case he would appoint at a rate of $125 per hour.

On July 14 Attorney Torphy was contacted as to the appointment.  Attorney Torphy has accepted the appointment.  Order Appointing Counsel to be prepared and forwarded to the Court for Judge's signature.  

Case remains scheduled for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.

Clerk:  jms
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Gregory L Boose (appears via Zoom video), in custody.  Paul Leonard Tiffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin (appears in person).
Court advises defendant that counsel has not yet been appointed as to this case.
Due to the State Public Defender failing to timely appoint counsel the court will appoint counsel at Milwaukee County expense.

Court advises defendant that he has two attorneys in mind and will appoint one to represent defendant.

Court orders case adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.

Clerk:  jms
Order to show cause hearing scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Gregory L Boose (appears via Zoom video) with Attorney Thomas Holland Reed (appears in person).  Defendant Gregory L Boose in custody.  Paul Leonard Tiffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin (appears in person).
Statements to the Court by defense counsel as to their attempts to appoint counsel.
Discussion with the parties.
Family member of the victim appears via Zoom video and makes statements to the Court.

Court will appoint counsel for Defendant.  The Court appoints Attorney Scott Connors to represent defendant at the rate of $125 per hour;  Attorney Connors NOT present in court but will be contacted by the deputy clerk as to the appointment. 

Court defers ruling as to State vs. Lee on today's date and orders case adjourned for further proceedings in Branch 28.  

Clerk:  jms

Defendant Gregory L Boose not in court, defendant in custody.  Edward OBrien appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for cause to the trial court for a State V. Lee Hearing.  Hearing scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Gregory L Boose not in court, defendant in custody.  Paul Leonard Tiffin appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel. State requests the matter be sent to the trial court for a State V. Lee hearing. Request is denied.  Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Gregory L Boose not in court, defendant in custody.  Paul Leonard Tiffin appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel.
 Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Gregory L Boose in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Gregory L Boose in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Gregory L Boose appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rothstein, Branch 25.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has NOT been obtained from the Defendant.  Court ordered the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department to obtain DNA sample from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  

This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:

Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
